page.title: 09Long Chimney Cottage,Belper
page.content: Mrs.Abbott lives at{Long Chimney} {Cottage.}She has lived there for 24 years. The cottage used to be a lodge for a farm-labourer at {Handley Farm.} She bought it from the{Chatsworth {Estates.}It had been derelict for 7 years and she changed it completely. It is over 100 years old.It took 2 years to rebuild and she has cornish slate for her floor. There was only a pump for water and a generator for electricity at first but now there is mains. Mrs.Abbott started dog kennels in 1971. She keeps dogs and cats while people go on holiday. Most of her time is spent looking after dogs,feeding them,taking them for walks and cleaning the kennels out. It costs Â£340 for 40 bags of dog food which lasts for 6 weeks. She has a few girls to take dogs for walks.
